name: ganlon-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder has 1/4 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to raise its Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/4 max HP to boost Defense.

flavor_text.x_y: A Berry to be consumed by Pokémon. If a Pokémon holds one, its Defense stat will increase when it’s in a pinch.
